import React from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; const SchoolRules = () => { const attendanceRules = [ "Punctual and regular attendance is insisted upon", "If a student is absent due to illness or any other valid reason, the Principal should be informed immediately by a note from the parent/guardian", "No half day leave is allowed", "Minimum 75% attendance is compulsory for promotion", "Students are expected to be punctual, regular, attentive and sincere to their studies", "If a student is not in a position to attend school, he/she should send an application for leave stating reason and duly signed by parents" ]; const uniformRules = [ "Students should be habitually clean and always neatly dressed", "The school uniform should be worn on all working days and for all school functions", "Students who are untidily dressed or not in proper uniform will face disciplinary action", "Caps, slippers, sandals, mufflers, stylish hair-cut, low waist trousers & jewellery of any kind will not be allowed", "Students are not allowed to wear jewellery in school", "There should be a name tag on blazers and sweaters", "Students are expected to come to school in proper uniform" ]; const behaviorRules = [ "Respect teachers, staff, and fellow students", "Maintain discipline and decorum at all times", "No use of mobile phones or electronic devices", "No eating or drinking in classrooms", "Keep school premises clean and tidy", "Follow instructions immediately and respectfully", "No fighting, bullying, or harassment", "Report any problems to teachers or staff" ]; const academicRules = [ "Complete all homework and assignments on time", "Bring required books and materials daily", "Participate actively in classroom activities", "Maintain notebooks and study materials properly", "Follow examination rules and regulations", "Seek help from teachers when needed", "Use library and laboratory facilities responsibly", "Maintain academic integrity and honesty" ]; const safetyRules = [ "Follow safety instructions in laboratories", "Use playground equipment safely and responsibly", "Report any accidents or injuries immediately", "No running in corridors or staircases", "Keep emergency exits clear and accessible", "Follow fire drill procedures when instructed", "No bringing of dangerous or harmful objects", "Maintain personal safety and security awareness" ]; return (

School Rules

School Values & Principles
Respect

We value respect for self, others, and the environment. Students are expected to treat everyone with dignity and kindness.

Integrity

We promote honesty, truthfulness, and moral uprightness. Students are encouraged to do what is right even when no one is watching.

Excellence

We strive for excellence in all endeavors. Students are encouraged to give their best effort in academics and activities.

{/* Consequences and Rewards */}

Consequences & Rewards
Consequences for Rule Violations
  • Verbal warning for minor infractions
  • Written warning for repeated offenses
  • Parent notification for serious violations
  • Detention or community service
  • Suspension for major violations
  • Expulsion for severe offenses
Rewards for Good Behavior
  • Recognition in school assembly
  • Good conduct certificates
  • Student of the month awards
  • Leadership opportunities
  • Special privileges and responsibilities
  • Participation in special events
 {/* Contact Information */}

Rule Inquiries

For questions about school rules or to report violations:

Principal Office

 ); }; export default SchoolRules;
